attributes.action: Be BRITISH and do what is necessary to show the world that we do not negotiate with hostage takers. Even if it leads us to military action, BE BRITISH and remember all the sacrifices of the past.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that the enemies of Britain may feel that we are distracted because of the War on Terror. We must show the world that our principles remain the same. We will never negotiate with hostage takers and not be bullied by dictatorial states.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
